Class ContentsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.egit.github.core.service.GitHubService

  • public class ContentsService
extends GitHubService
    Service for accessing repository contents
    See Also:
    GitHub contents API documentation

      • getContents

        public List<RepositoryContents> getContents(IRepositoryIdProvider repository,
                                            String path,
                                            String ref)
                                     throws IOException
        Get contents of path at reference in given repository

        For file paths this will return a list with one entry corresponding to the file contents at the given path

        Parameters:
        repository -
        path -
        ref -
        Returns:
        list of contents at path
        Throws:
        IOException
